Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Producer" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="pProducer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Category" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Severity" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessageByteLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessage" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string" length="DebugMessageByteLength"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Producer" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="pProducer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Category" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Severity" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessageByteLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessage" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string" length="DebugMessageByteLength"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Producer" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="pProducer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Category" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Severity" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessageByteLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessage" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string" length="DebugMessageByteLength"/> </template>
